abstract: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency (DVLA) holds over 47 million driver records and over 39 million vehicle records. DVLA collects around 5.6 billion a year in Vehicle Excise Duty (VED). DVLA is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Transport. What If your Direct Debit vehicle tax payment fails ,How to tell DVLA you've changed address? Need to take a personalised registration number off your vehicle? Buying a car today? The tax or SORN doesnt come with it. Find out more  Check a vehicle's details, tax and SORN status and expiry dates on the Driver Vehicle and Licensing Agency database - online and telephone enquiries.
